branchCategory.name: 90-RSDQ, Stopper Cylinder, Fixed Mounting Height
branchCategory.description: <p>Stopper Cylinder series 90-RSDQ is a fixed-height stopper cylinder with proven endurance and low breakaway characteristics.  90-RSDQ is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. It can be raised or lowered according to the distance required to stop the work piece. </p>
